alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 26 at 4:35PM CDT until August 27 at 4:46AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Minor flooding of Heymann Park off of Highway 90 will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 PM CDT Friday the stage was 10.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 4:15 PM CDT Friday was 10.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this afternoon and continue falling to 7.8 feet Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Vermilion River Lafayette, Surrey Street Gag 10.0 10.2 Fri 4 pm CDT 8.3 8.1 8.0 &&
